page.title: 09HOMELIFE - FOOD
page.content: MOST OF THE FOOD WE EAT CAN BE CLASSED AS "CONVENIENCE FOOD"-READILY AVAILABLE IN SHOPS,CAN BE STORED FOR LONG PERIODS OF TIME(TINS OR PACKETS) AND IS EASILY AND QUICKLY PREPARED. FRESH FOOD CONSISTS OF FRUIT AND VEGETABLES. THIS IS A TYPICAL SUNDAY MENU. BREAKFAST:CEREAL,TOAST,BOILED EGG,TEA OR COFFEE OR FRUIT JUICE. LUNCH:MEAT OR POULTRY,CARROTS,PEAS, CABBAGE,SWEDE,POTATOES,GRAVY. TEATIME: CAKE,ICECREAM,VARIOUS SANDWICHES. SUPPER: CEREALS,TOASTED SANDWICHES,TEA OR COFFEE. SNACKS EATEN DURING THE DAY MIGHT CONSIST OF:-CRISPS OR BISCUITS OR FRUIT OR VARIOUS CHOCOLATE BARS. MILK IS PATEURISED AND DELIVERED TO OUR DOORSTEPS DAILY.
